data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Nakapiripirit, Uganda to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nakapiripirit, Uganda
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Nakapiripirit, Uganda with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the state of Nakapiripirit against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Nakapiripirit, Uganda that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
Lord, help the people of Nakapiripirit, Uganda to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Nakapiripirit, Uganda to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.section_summary:
the state of Nakapiripirit, Uganda has a population of 3,800.

We estimate Nakapiripirit has 1,260 people who might know Jesus, 1,898 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 643 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 1,260 believers in the state of Nakapiripirit the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.
